p: A full structure elucidation of these compounds is presented in the Supplementary Materials (Figures S1–S33; Tables S1–S4). Compound 1 was identified by comparison of its 1H, 13C and mass spectral data with that of the literature [ 11]. The structures of 2– 4 were determined by full 2D NMR analysis, particularly using HMBC spectroscopy. In addition to these techniques, for compound 4, the position of the double bond was identified by derivatization and comparison of fragments with a mass spectral library, confidently allowing placement of the double bond between C-8 and C-9.
